display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                      
[media]
# **Fight the Undead**
Undead Quest is a VR rogue-lite wave shooter. Hit, dodge, and slash your way through thousands of fun-filled undead foes.

[media]
# **Hit, Dodge, Slash, Repeat**
Your primary weapons are a bat and a magic ball. Master your skills and kill the undead from a distance or use the environment to make a combo kill.

[media]
# **Upgrade and Build Ultimate Skillset** 
Collect the points and choose from dozens of available upgrades - augment your ball with devastating powers.

[media]
# **One More Run**
Uncover the mystery of the undead by completing the story mode or see how long you can survive in survival mode. The game sessions are roguelite-inspired, so each playthrough and skill set you create will be unique.

# **Fight the Undead**
Undead Quest is a VR rogue-lite wave shooter. Hit, dodge, and slash your way through thousands of fun-filled undead foes.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/507828918_751061897295113_399559700241501768_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=wkrEI0lSKKkQ7kNvwFmrbQH&_nc_oc=AdmlErl7oZcYwdXqcBawMv5-um_VMSl8rPRnsLVKxKX0sERiQes2OHhcsT66pXYxEtk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=xQf4h2DJbcpcWwS0eShA5Q&oh=00_AfuHKCkCtHj6WDjnzi8WEciM3P8LmWJj7hqtQocQeMAJ8g&oe=6989E299)
# **Hit, Dodge, Slash, Repeat**
Your primary weapons are a bat and a magic ball. Master your skills and kill the undead from a distance or use the environment to make a combo kill.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491823763_4154099168195233_6412607577589191733_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=MJ1AfQkhwAsQ7kNvwGyo1Q9&_nc_oc=Adl8qK3aXPk9_2_8zJUD3ZwOg6Am1all0IdVFmoteGFR7nD0bud3p7TUOVAU6TbC90Y&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=xQf4h2DJbcpcWwS0eShA5Q&oh=00_AftfMzO4jwaRu8HWdep1CwV4nQlo0OckiUaBrJDwIwpoMA&oe=6989FB5E)
# **Upgrade and Build Ultimate Skillset** 
Collect the points and choose from dozens of available upgrades - augment your ball with devastating powers.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491820987_1099167878797501_6609429194438124224_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=KlwmT-F2qS4Q7kNvwGFNl1e&_nc_oc=Adm0PYMbeF79frUIAgpcgicegUqz_BksDK2OVF2_scDvKm5eZuNzISVnJKBr3wxRh9M&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=xQf4h2DJbcpcWwS0eShA5Q&oh=00_AfsyWZ2gvWWAKckVvDxRwFdLvvpAQG5o0RDHj4a1tdq9ag&oe=698A140A)
# **One More Run**
Uncover the mystery of the undead by completing the story mode or see how long you can survive in survival mode. The game sessions are roguelite-inspired, so each playthrough and skill set you create will be unique.
